channel.title: Help - Ladder and NPC
channel.description:
I made a ladder going underground with walls at the main floor surrounding the ladder at some parts. is there a way to make it so when you climb the ladder, it wont make you go through the wall? Or do i have to give specific coordinates for climbing up the ladder?
Also, when editing an npc, I noticed you could change its looks through <int>(number)</int>. How do you tell specifically which number is what the NPC's armor or other body parts will be?
Thanks if you can answer.

item.title: Help - Ladder and NPC
item.dc:creator: @TheJoker619 TheJoker619
item.description:
@TheJoker619 wrote:

Can anyone help me with these? How would I go about making it so that when you climb up a ladder, it teleports you to specific coordinates.

Also, does anyone know the integers for an npc on which specific item the hat/hair to pants will be?

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Ladder and NPC
item.dc:creator: @I_PR0PKER_I I_PR0PKER_I
item.description:
@I_PR0PKER_I wrote:

  1. Update elevations
  2. Its seperated into integers from hat/hair to pants

Read full topic
